info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:08PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Rutherford, east central Henderson and Polk Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 207 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Columbus, or 4 miles south of Lake Lure, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Lake Lure, Saluda, Chimney Rock Village, Chimney Rock State Park, Bat Cave, Tryon, Dana, Mill Spring and Edneyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
